ygData.subject: Re: Into the LIGHT!
ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson takes Perceptor s advice into heart, as he rolls into the Ark. Thank you Perceptor, I will definitely try to encourage him with positive feedback.  A

Tucson takes Perceptor's advice into heart, as he rolls into the Ark.

"Tha=
nk you Perceptor, I will definitely try to encourage him with positive feed=
back.  A heart can still talk to a heart and get through, it's the one thin=
g that separates us from our enemies."

He rolls in as Rat Trap nodds to Lo=
rd Elders' statement and then looks to Cheetor.

" Oh? And I suppose you kn=
ow about this computer pussycat?  Oh well, if ya ask me this thing's due fo=
r some major upgrades."

Night Shift looks back at Cheetor.

"He's gotchya =
there kiddo.  He's right, this stuff goes back vorns ago, it could do with =
a sizeable upgrade."

He then turns to Airhammer.

"Gotchya, no hard feeln'=
s, we'll talk later!"

Quickstride snorts.

" Patience isn't one of Noctorr=
o's strong points is it?"

Night Shift nodds.

"Got that right, and that co=
uld hurt 'em sooner or later.  Now, about Rodimus..  Looks like Tucson can'=
t get through ta his radio 'cause it's off line. "

Rat Trap anaylizes the =
tendrils.

"It's gotta have somethn' ta do with those tendrils.  But if we =
rip 'em off, we'll do more harm than good.  Truth is we have no idea what w=
e're dealn' with and I don't wanna make things worse."

" Hmmm, maybe a lit=
tle encouragement from familliar comrades will sort of get 'em gon'under th=
ere. Night Shift, as far as ya know, Wheels worked really close ta Rodimus =
right?"

Night Shift nodds.

"Sure did.  Although, they had their disagreem=
ents now'n then.  Rodimus ben' a hot rod, and Tucson ben' an off roader, wh=
o always put saftey before speed, and Rodimus with his habit of speedn' on =
the roadways...  Oh yeah, that kinda did annoy Tucson a little bit, but oth=
er than that, they're close."

Rat Trap listens.

"Okay then, maybe if Whee=
ls was here, talkn' ta him, that might spark somethn' without him havn' ta =
give up his spark ta save 'em. Wait here, I'm gonna go get Wheels."

As he =
darts out to find Tucson Prime, he nearly bumps into Lord Elder, but catche=
s himself, as he approaches Tucson Prime.

"Tucson Prime, sir, your radio i=
sn't gettn' through ta Rodimus, and truth is we dunno what will.  Our guess=
 is that if you could stay in the room with us  and start conversn' with 'e=
m, that might just spark somethn' in 'em ta try'n come back online and figh=
t off whatever hold those tendrills got on 'em."

Tucson Prime nodds.

"Yes=
, Perceptor just told me.  Lord Elder, I'll be in the CR chamber room, look=
ing after Rodimus with Night Shift and Rat Trap.  I strongly believe that P=
erceptor and Rat Trap's idea will hopefully get something going."

He drive=
s Talon in with him as well as Perceptor, as he comes to a halt in the very=
 room where Rodimus is lying in a coccoon of Tendrils.

"Rodimus, I'm here,=
 and I have a message for you.  Nightlight and Elita desperately need you, =
and truthfully so do I.  We are strength in numbers, and without you that s=
trength can not hold. You are sadly missed my friend, and I will not have y=
ou be missed for long.  Do you hear me?  You've faced worse, you can overco=
me this, I know you can."

  

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston Carro=
ll <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>
> <OLD>
> > Rat Trap taps feverishly on the=
 computer to try and get it to desist firing on Perceptor, at the same time=
 he was happy to know that Lord Elder had said something to Tucson Prime.
>=
 >
> > "UGHH! C'mon computer, if I say somethn's okay, it's okay! It ain't =
like I'm gonna bug ya with a virus! Perceptor's a pred but he's changn' sid=
es! Stupid piece of outdated hardware! Well, at least Lord Elder said somet=
hn' ta Wheels, I don't wanna ever hear him try'n ta put his spark on the li=
ne ever again."
> 
> <NEW>
> The computer readily responds to Rat Trap's wi=
shes and shuts down its
> attack sequence. The shield's drop and the weapon=
s go back to stand-by
> condition. However on Rat Trap's console the comput=
er continues to
> register the fact that there is a Predacon signature in t=
he area
> although all other alarms shut down.
> 
> Lord elder looked aroun=
d the command center, his stance calm and
> relaxed. "Don't worry." he said=
 consolingly to Rat Trap, "We have lost
> too many already, I am not lookin=
g to loose Tuscon so quickly."
> 
> Cheetor came up and stood next to Rat T=
rap smacking him on the back in
> a friendly gesture, "You think you got th=
e computer under control
> now?" he said teasing the smaller Maximal as he =
smiled, "You look like
> you couldn't handle it."
> 
> <OLD>
> > Quickstrid=
e and Night Shift try to deal with Noctorro, but his prodding was getting o=
n the Autobot's nerves more than anything else.
> >
> > "Look, we're don' t=
he best we can, and we really don't know what we're dealn' with here, this =
is completely alien ta all of us and you're gonna have ta show some patienc=
e."
> >
> > Quickstride snorts and looks over to Noctorro.
> >
> > "C'mon, =
give us some breathing room will ya?! Geeze!."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> Noctorro loo=
ked like he was about to go off for a moment, his optics
> looking a defini=
te crimson as he locked gazes with Quickstride.
> However Airhammer stepped=
 in the middle of them and looked back at
> Noctorro, "Maybe we can go find=
 out. It's obvious they have much work
> to do."
> 
> Noctorro nodded and l=
aughed as he rubbed the back of his head with a
> nervous almost embarrased=
 gesture, "Sure." he said looking definitly
> sheepish. "You're right, let'=
s go."
> 
> "Airhammer looked at Quickstride and Nightshift, "He get's that=
 way
> sometimes, but he means well." he said quietly as they turned to lea=
ve
> the room.
> 
> <OLD>
> > Outside, Tucson Prime acknolwedges the readin=
ess to come aboard.
> >
> > "This is Tucson Prime to Lord Elder, I'm commin=
g back to the Ark as you requested. And let's see what the medics can do, i=
f they need my help I'm here to give to them. Perceptor, Talon, don't worry=
, you will not be losing me any time soon, I assure you. I wonder if I can =
get a link up with Rodimus remotely. As an Autobot we should be able to com=
 link with each other."
> >
> > He attempts to connect with Rodimus's com l=
ink, hoping to get through to him.
> 
> Elder responds from the command cen=
ter, "I will pass that on to them.
> I am sure they are working as hard as =
they can." Elder said, trying
> keep the peace, and yet trying to keep Tusc=
on from jumping headlong
> into sacrificing himself again.
> 
> Tuscon atte=
mpts to connect with Rodimus but get's no response. It is
> as if his radio=
 is offline or not responding. Perhaps it has something
> to do with the fa=
ct that Rodimus is completely wrapped in the strange
> alien metal tendrils=
.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
